title: Usage of abbreviations in glossing

## Overview

Plots frequencies of abbreviations and expansion in the editions of the Latin glosses to the Targum Onkelos and to the Septuagint.

## Notebook

:::{.callout-warning title="Uses local resources"}
This notebook uses data in local files, and expects to be run files from a copy of [this github repository](https://github.com/neelsmith/complutensian-texts).
:::

- [HTML version](./abbrs.html) (readable in a web browser)
- [Pluto notebook](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/neelsmith/complutensian-texts/refs/heads/main/pluto/physical-artifact/abbrs.jl) (download and open in Pluto)
